name: redactor
description: Browser extension to redact social media posts that match word filters.

scripts.build: rollup -c && npm run polyfill && cp -r src/web-extension dist
scripts.start: npm run build && web-ext -s dist/web-extension run & rollup -cw
scripts.package: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run zip
scripts.version: echo '/"version"/ya v | n | /"version"/pu v | -1d | x' | ex package.json src/web-extension/manifest.json && git add src/web-extension/manifest.json

author: Mohamed Akram
